name: TGA20 Game Project 5 - Thorwald's Lament
description:
Use your otherworldly powers to explore a mysterious corrupted world on a quest to save your dear dog from an unknown monstrous entity.

Thorwald's Lament is a 2D action-adventure that takes place in a world overtaken by monsters. Take on the role as Thorwald: a man who lost both his dog and an arm during the attack. Fight back against the invading monsters and save the world!

Thorwald's Lament was developed by Monki Flip  from The Game Assembly Stockholm class of 2020. Using The Game Assembly's in-house 2D engine during their 5th game project spanning 8 weeks part-time (50%).

The Game Assembly is a Higher Vocational Education located in Malmö and Stockholm in Sweden. We educate game developers!

The Game Assembly’s curriculum’s in Game art, Leveldesign, Technical art, Game programming and Game Animation is written by the Swedish games industry and we continously have a dialogue about how to be in the frontier of game production.

Parallel with individual courses throughout the education our students are assigned to groups and together they create 8 games of various types, some of which you will be able to find on this page.
